checklist.title: High IV Goodra
checklist.notes: Goodra's moveset preferences may differ between open Master League and Master Premier, so look to keep multiple just in case.

checklist.title: Lickitung Slayer
checklist.notes: Goodra with at least 122.9 Attack guarantees a Dragon Breath breakpoint to beat Lickitung. This IV spread maximizes HP but other IV spreads are possible.
